library("tidyverse")

## Loading the .qmd files

```{r}
first_path <- "~/projects/R_project"

files <- c("R/01_load.qmd",
           "R/02_clean.qmd",
           "R/03_augment.qmd",
           "R/04_describe.qmd",
           "R/05_analysis_1.qmd",
           "R/06_analysis_2.qmd",
           "R/07_analysis_3.qmd",
           "R/08_analysis_4.qmd",
           "R/09_analysis_5.qmd"
           )

purrr::walk(files, ~{
  file_path <- file.path(first_path, 
                         .x)  
  purl_file <- purl(file_path, 
                    output = tempfile(fileext = ".R"))
  source(purl_file)
  message("File was run and executed: ", 
          file_path)
})
```
